body:
Hi! I was reading the comments of my post: Transfer Marker for update it, and when i update it i always say it in the commments but when i was going to say it, someone archived it and doesnt say why, and i want know 

Why the post was archived?

title: What happend with my post?

replies.body: Did you accidentally archive it? A staff member should be able to check.
replies.body_tagged: Did you accidentally archive it? A staff member should be able to check.
